led_manager module¶

class led_manager.PinName[source][doc]¶

Bases: enum.IntEnum

Contains all the led pins with their function

Add other led pins here

class led_manager.LedManager(scheduler)[source][doc]¶

Bases: builtins.object

Manages the gpio pins.

update_led(pin_name, ledstate)[source][doc]¶

If the pin has an other state, it will be updated.

enable_output(pin_nr)[source][doc]¶

Tries to activate the gpio pin. If the activation is successfull, the pin is set as output.

activate(pin_nr)[source][doc]¶
set_as_output(pin_nr)[source][doc]¶
turn_on(pin_nr)[source][doc]¶

Sets gpio pin on

turn_off(pin_nr)[source][doc]¶

Sets gpio pin off

flash(pin_nr, msecs)[source][doc]¶

Sets gpio pin on for certain msecs.

Parameters:
  • pin_nr – gpio pin
  • msecs – time in milliseconds the pin will be on
class led_manager.LedCall(led_manager, led_pin)[source][doc]¶

Bases: builtins.object

Instances of this class are given to classes which have events that controls the leds.

on()[source][doc]¶
off()[source][doc]¶
